Class PolicySetDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.dao.PolicySetDAO

  • public class PolicySetDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for querying Database for queries related to Policy Sets

    1.0
    Author:
